00148     // Order of dimension elements: Time, Mass, Length, Angle
00149     // Value of dimension elements: exponent of that unit type
00150 
00157     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0> dimensionless;
00158 
00160     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0> time;
00161

00164

00167

00183

00234     template <class Dimensions, class Precision = DefaultPrecision>
00235     struct Quantity
00236     {
00238         explicit Quantity(Precision x)
00239         : m_value(x)
00240         {}
00241 
00249         template <class OtherDimensions>
00250         Quantity(Quantity<OtherDimensions, T> const& rhs)
00251                 : _value(rhs.value()) {
00252             BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((
00253                 mpl::equal<Dimensions,OtherDimensions>::type::value
00254             ));
00255         }
00256 
00258         Precision value() const { return _value; }
00259     private:
00260         Precision _value;
00261     };
00262 
00265 
00271     template<class D, class T>
00272     Quantity<D, T> operator+(const Quantity<D, T> & l, const Quantity<D, T> & r) {
00273         return Quantity<D,T>(l.value() + r.value());
00274     }
00275 
00281     template<class D, class T>
00282     Quantity<D, T> operator-(const Quantity<D, T> & l, const Quantity<D, T> & r) {
00283         return Quantity<D,T>(l.value() - r.value());
00284     }

00289 
00290     namespace Internal {
00291         using namespace mpl::placeholders;
00294 
00295         template <class D1, class D2>
00296         struct multiply_dimensions
00297         : mpl::transform<D1,D2,mpl::add<_1,_2> >
00298         {};
00299 
00300         template <class D1, class D2>
00301         struct divide_dimensions
00302         : mpl::transform<D1,D2,mpl::minus<_1,_2> >
00303         {};
00305     } // end of Internal namespace
00306 
00315     template <class D1, class D2, class T>
00316     Quantity<T, typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type>
00317     operator*(Quantity<D1, T> l, Quantity<D2, T> r) {
00318         return Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>(
00319             l.value() * r.value());
00320     }
00321 
00322 
00326     template <class D1, class D2, class T>
00327     Quantity<T, typename Internal::divide_dimensions<D1,D2>::type>
00328     operator/(Quantity<D1, T> l, Quantity<D2, T> r) {
00329         return Quantity<typename Internal::divide_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>(
00330             l.value() / r.value());
00331     }

00338     typedef Quantity<mass> Kilograms;
00339     typedef Quantity<length> Meters;
00340     typedef Quantity<force> Newtons;
00341     typedef Quantity<speed> MetersPerSecond;
00342     typedef Quantity<accel> MetersPerSecondPerSecond;
00343     typedef Quantity<torque> NewtonMeters;
00344     typedef Quantity<stiffness> NewtonsPerMeter;
